ValidMaintainers.Description: GitHub users who maintain this folder. PR for changing this folder will only be accepted from these users.

Logo.Description: Community logo is a .png file 500X500px in this folder!

Locations.Description: Each location where your community will be running a Global Azure event.
Locations.Name: Porto Alegre
Locations.Description_Lat_Lon: The Lat and Lon location for where you want your community pin on the Global Azure Community Map (example 47.6457554, -122.1299952).
